pages.title: The Warden Staff
pages.text: To obtain The Warden Staff you will need to craft it using Echo Shards and a Heart Of The Deep.$(br2)This Powerful Staff will allow you to deal high amounts of projectile damage by shooting a 'Sonic Boom' at your target!

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: To Repair the Staff Use Echo Shards in an Anvil.
